metadata.synopsis: The player spots a set of statues that might be more movable than they first appear - and can be tipped off by a book in the monastery that bypasses the perception check.
metadata.how_to_trigger: To trigger: walk to -68; 0; -68 in the Upper Gith Creche, as you approach the statues the PAD triggers

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Hmm, some strange grooves by the statues... I wonder if they can be moved?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Huh, that book mentioned Lathander statues that moved...
